greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Formula for Wolfram's Rule 126 cellular automaton: a(n) = (n XOR 2n) OR (n XOR 4n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
S. Wolfram, A New Kind of Science
Index entries for sequences related to cellular automata
formula: a(n) = A048724(n) OR A048725(n) = (n XOR 2n) OR (n XOR 4n), where OR is a bitwise-or (A003986) and XOR is A003987.
example: a(4) = (4 XOR 2*4) OR (4 XOR 4*4) = 12 OR 20 = 28. - _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 02 2017
program: (Python) print([(n^(2*n))|(n^(4*n)) for n in range(101)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Apr 02 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 22 2016
